function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Difficulty in classifying faces covered by hands, which may lead to inaccurate identification of mask-wearing individuals.","Impact":"Inaccurate identification of mask-wearing individuals may result in the spread of contagious diseases.","Mitigation":"Use additional sensors or technologies to detect the presence of masks and verify identity through other means, such as voice recognition or biometric authentication.","Technologies":"Advanced computer vision algorithms, additional sensors for hand and arm detection, voice recognition, biometric authentication","People":"General public, individuals at risk of exposure to contagious diseases","Owner":"City authorities, technology developers, system administrators"},{"Description":"Inability to locate people without face masks in densely populated areas due to the limitations of the system.","Impact":"Failure to identify and alert individuals without face masks, leading to increased risk of contagious disease transmission in crowded settings.","Mitigation":"Deploy additional surveillance and monitoring systems, integrate with crowd management technologies, and implement a multi-tiered approach to identify and alert individuals without face masks.","Technologies":"Crowd monitoring technology, integrated surveillance systems, multi-sensor data fusion, integrated alarm and alert systems","People":"City administrators, urban planners, public health officials","Owner":"City authorities, urban planning organizations, public health agencies"},{"Description":"System failure when there is a problem in the network, leading to the inability to send information about violators via SMS.","Impact":"Inability to alert authorities and individuals about non-compliance with mask-wearing regulations, resulting in unaddressed violations and increased risk of contagious disease transmission.","Mitigation":"Implement redundancy in communication networks, utilize alternative communication channels (e.g., internet-based messaging), and develop offline storage and forwarding mechanisms for delayed transmission.","Technologies":"Redundant communication networks, internet-based messaging platforms, offline data storage and forwarding mechanisms","People":"System administrators, city authorities, general public","Owner":"System administrators, communication infrastructure providers, city authorities"}]}
